column3: kosh in a one stop solution for all fashion fads.... it has a great collection from good designers be it rohit bal, ritu, ashima leena n the jing bang...!!But thats not the only comendable part of Kosh.. it also has very good service, the owner- shweta personally is there with you to assit you and the ambience is just perfect..... !! to add up the prices are wonderful you feel the value addedto your dollar be it for self or as a gift....!!MUST SEE.....!! N THEN SHOP
